name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-performance applications using **Node.js**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **PHP**. Proficient in crafting dynamic interfaces and robust backend systems, employing technologies such as **VueJS**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and integration tools like **Git**, **Webpack**, and **npm**. Skilled in developing and implementing **AI** solutions and automation tools, while leveraging cloud-native architectures. Proven success in delivering impactful projects at industry leaders, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, committed to fostering efficient workflows and enhancing overall user experience.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and implemented robust full-stack solutions leveraging **Node.js** and **VueJS** for responsive user interfaces and efficient API-driven communication.
Utilized **Git** for version control, ensuring seamless collaboration across teams and efficient code management.
Developed complex web applications using **JavaScript**, **CSS**, **HTML**, and **TypeScript**, adhering to best practices and performance optimization techniques.
Automated testing and enhanced application reliability using **Mocha** and **Jest**, maintaining a code coverage of over **80%**.
Employed **npm** for package management and **Webpack** for module bundling, improving the build process efficiency by **30%**.
Integrated styles using **SASS** and **PostCSS**, ensuring modern design compatibility across different browsers.
Led project sprints, delivering features on-time and within budget, improving project delivery timelines by **25%**.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather requirements, address challenges, and ensure alignment with business objectives.

• Developed and implemented user-friendly front-end applications using **VueJS**, **JavaScript**, **CSS**, and **HTML**, ensuring responsive design and seamless user experience.
• Collaborated in building robust backend systems utilizing **Node.js** for creating RESTful APIs and managing database interactions efficiently.
• Leveraged version control through **Git** to maintain code integrity across **10+** projects and facilitate team collaboration.
• Configured build processes with **Webpack** and managed dependencies using **npm** for streamlined development workflows.
• Conducted unit and integration testing with **Mocha** and **Jest**, ensuring high-quality code and reducing bugs by **30%** prior to deployment.
• Collaborated with the team in an Agile environment, participating in **bi-weekly** sprints and contributing to continuous improvement initiatives.
• Engaged in code reviews and knowledge sharing sessions, fostering a culture of collaboration and technical excellence.

• Developed and maintained fullstack applications leveraging **Node.js**, **VueJS**, and **JavaScript**, ensuring optimal performance and user experience across the platform.
• Built responsive user interfaces using **HTML**, **CSS**, **SASS**, and **PostCSS**, achieving a seamless design across **3** major browsers.
• Integrated APIs and backend services for trade execution and account tracking using **Python** and **Flask**, enhancing trading operations by reducing latency by **20%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement robust testing frameworks with **Mocha**, **Jest**, and **PyTest**, increasing test coverage to **95%** and streamlining CI processes.
• Utilized version control systems such as **Git** to manage and document code changes effectively, promoting team collaboration and versioning accuracy.
• Deployed cloud solutions and third-party tools to optimize application performance and scalability, accommodating an average of **1,000** active users daily.
• Implemented state management in **VueJS** applications to manage complex data flows, which improved user interaction response times by **30%**.
